Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Druid): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Armor Interference+: In light, medium, or heavy armor, suffers -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features
Armor Interference: In medium or heavy armor, suffers -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Cursed+: Powers cast to aid self suffer -2 arcane skill; critical failure stuns caster
Material Components+: Suffers -4 arcane skill rolls when materials are unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
One With Nature: Summon Animal and Shape Change (natural animal) last 1 hr
Talisman+: -2 casting when talisman is unavailable; critical failure stuns
Talisman: -1 casting when talisman is unavailable; critical failure stuns
